issue.title: TLS decrypt error
issue.body:
Hi all,

I have followed the steps in dockerfile of oqs-httpd docker image and kind of built a OQS-enabled httpd server on my Linux machine(Ubuntu 20.04).

However, when I tried to use the curl command from my client side machine (also Ubuntu 20.04) it kept showing decryption error as shown below.
![螢幕擷取畫面 2021-08-19 164450](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85988181/130040254-4cfc9dd1-9050-485e-b021-15c77fe4901c.png)

And if i use -k option the request succeed but with error saying "certificate signiture failure".
 
![螢幕擷取畫面 2021-08-19 150538](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85988181/130040560-0a49dc5c-dcba-4964-9875-75b130de3618.png)


Btw, the content of the oqs-bundle.pem file was directly copied from CA.crt file on my httpd server.
Also, I followed exactly the same steps (only changed the CN of my server) in [https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/oqs-demos/blob/main/httpd/USAGE.md#creating-test-ca-and-server-certificates](url) to build my key and certificates.


Does anyone know how to solve this?
Thanks.
